usefulItems: thermal serving bowl or other large bowl
title: Pasta alla puttanesca

ingredients.content: 80 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into cubes (3 cm)
1 long red chilli, deseeded if preferred
500 g dried spaghetti pasta, broken into halves
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste
fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place Parmesan into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add chilli and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste, capers, anchovies, olives, oregano and water and cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add spaghetti and cook <b>10-12 min/100°C//speed 1<b>, until pasta is al dente. Transfer pasta into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl, then stir through reserved Parmesan.
Season to taste with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley and serve.

hintsAndTricks: Pasta that is cooked al dente is tender but still firm to the bite.
